channel.title: Max combat level help

item.title: Max combat level help
item.dc:creator: @hippie408 hippie408
item.description:
@hippie408 wrote:

Player Combat is based on the level of the skills, so its different depending on max cb skills.

NPC Combat you can’t change unless you have your own client (NOT silab or mopar)

Read full topic

item.title: Max combat level help
item.dc:creator: @luciferkills luciferkills
item.description:
@luciferkills wrote:

Ok I have two problems…before you tell me something I dont know I have changed to this:

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 199; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
    		return lvl;
		}
		}
		return 199;[/code]

and my max stat level is currently 99/199? i just tested it on ddpec source and it works perfectly but now its on richscape source with his client. help? and one more thing is there a way to separately change max combat level?? ive experimented with changing max stat to change combat but it only goes up to 200 something before it resets to 0.

Read full topic
